titles.title: Recognizing the cultural and religious significance of Eid al-Adha and wishing Muslim-Americans and Muslims around the world a prosperous holiday.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 11/16/2010--Introduced. Recognizes the cultural and religious significance of Eid al-Adha (Festival of the Sacrifice, an Islamic holiday) and expresses appreciation for the contributions of Muslim-Americans to the United States.
